statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, interests[1] AS first_interest FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_id, ST_AsText(geo_location) AS location FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, gender FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 40 ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, age, interests FROM customer_profiles WHERE interests @> ARRAY['sports','travel'] ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, geo_location FROM customer_profiles WHERE ST_DWithin(geo_location, 'POINT(53.4808, -2.2426)', 10000) ORDER BY ST_Distance(geo_location, 'POINT(53.4808, -2.2426)') ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, age, gender, interests FROM customer_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND interests @> ARRAY['music'] ORDER BY gender, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, ST_AsText(location_geofence) as location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY campaign_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, location_geofence FROM customers JOIN marketing_campaigns ON customers.customer_id = marketing_campaigns.campaign_id WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
SELECT customer_name, location_geofence, start_date, end_date FROM customers CROSS JOIN marketing_campaigns WHERE ST_Distance(customers.location_geofence, marketing_campaigns.target_geofence) < 100;

SELECT customer_name, email, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM customers INNER JOIN marketing_campaigns ON customers.customer_id = marketing_campaigns.campaign_id ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_data;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_data WHERE geofence_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = '98765432-8765-8765-8765-876543210efg';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_data WHERE location_name LIKE 'Office%' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_data;
SELECT id, geofence_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_data WHERE radius > 10;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget < 5000;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_data WHERE radius > 100
SELECT geofence_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_data ORDER BY geofence_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns INNER JOIN campaign_targets ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_targets.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfile;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerProfile WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT geofence_name, latitude, longitude FROM Geofence WHERE geofence_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaign WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id FROM CustomerCampaign ORDER BY customer_id DESC, campaign_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM CustomerProfile;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM MarketingCampaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, geofence_id FROM CustomerGeofence WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name FROM MarketingCampaign;

SELECT customer_name, address, latitude, longitude FROM CustomerProfile JOIN CustomerGeofence ON CustomerProfile.customer_id = CustomerGeofence.customer_id JOIN Geofence ON CustomerGeofence.geofence_id = Geofence.geofence_id ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
